timeout.title: Your session will end in 5 minutes
timeout.line1: You have not done anything on the service for a while.
timeout.line2: Your session will end in 5 minutes if you do not do anything on the page. You'll need to start your application again if that happens.

cookies.canWeUseCookies: Can we use cookies in our services?
cookies.useAnalytics: We’d like to use analytics cookies to collect information about how you use our services. This helps us to make them better.
cookies.readMore: You can read more about our cookies before you decide.
cookies.yes: Yes, I’m OK with analytics cookies
cookies.no: No, do not use analytics cookies
cookies.youAccepted: You’ve accepted analytics cookies. You can change your cookie settings at any time.
cookies.youRejected: You’ve rejected analytics cookies. You can change your cookie settings at any time.
